description.value: The approve operation supports applying an approval to an existing artifact, regardless of status. The operation sets the _date_ and _approvalDate_ elements of the approved artifact, and is otherwise only allowed to create ArtifactAssessment resources in the repository.

comment.value: The approve operation supports the ability of a repository to record information about its' eligibility for release in an ArtifactAssessment resource upon completion of the review process. The ArtifactAssessments which are added by the operation must reference a version of the artifact.

documentation.value: The logical id of the artifact to approved. The server must know the artifact (e.g. it is defined explicitly in the server's artifacts)
The date on which the artifact was approved for release. If one is not provided the system date will be used.
If a comment is submitted as part of the approval, this parameter denotes the type of artifact comment.
The url for the artifact being approved. The format is the same as a canonical URL: [system]|[version] - e.g. http://loinc.org|2.56
Optional supporting reference for the comment.
The name of the party who approved the artifact for release. This must match the name which is specified as part of the endorser parameter.
